entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is bleeding from his hand. He is described as 'clutching his right hand in his left' and 'sweating under his breath'. (Chapter 2, In Memoriam)

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is suspected of setting a booby trap with a cup of cold tea. (Chapter 2, In Memoriam)

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: The street where Harry lives, described as 'the landing of number four'. (Chapter 2, In Memoriam)

relationships.description: Harry suspects that Dudley set a booby trap with a cup of cold tea. (Chapter 2, In Memoriam)
Harry lives on Privet Drive, described as 'the landing of number four'. (Chapter 2, In Memoriam)
